history.content:
HI there, 


You're ok as long as you

1) are on the Spring 2017 degree list

and 2) have followed the necessary steps/unit requirements for your college

If something is not right, you will receive an email prompting you to rectify before being released from your position. 

I have no concerns regarding your specific case.

Hi!

I'm currently a Senior in L&S CS and I'm also a Reader for the semester. I was planning on only taking 8 units this semester which I got approved by L&S but I saw that one of the requirements to be a Reader is to take the minimum units at least. I was wondering if L&S allows me to take 8 units that it can satisfy that requirement. @2491 is a similar question but it was never fully answered. Thank you!
history.subject: Reader Minimum Unit Requirement for Seniors
